data.name: VR HENTAI PLAY
data.detailed_description:
All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

Have a real and naughty private space all to yourself.
Gorgeous women with big tits, sex dolls, graphic features, and sex play that feels just like you are there.

Game description:
This is a room stuffed with men's dreams. Beautiful women, SM play, shooting, POV sex, stress relief.
Nothing is forbidden. Put on the HMD and you're in the metaverse of lust.

Controls:
- The left cross key switches the movement method. (Walking mode or teleportation mode)
- You can move freely in the room. You can wreck rooms with guns and metal bats.
- This is a special room with a shooting range. You can shoot without running out of bullets. Targets also recover automatically.
- Sex dolls can move their heads and body parts and can be moved by holding their hips.
- You can reset the room to its initial state with the reset button.

data.short_description: In VR, anything is possible! Enjoy realistic sex play!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Sexual violence
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations
> Bondage scenes, and mild violence
> BDSM-related content
> dominance and sadomasochism

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
